title: Huge lag for the past few days
body:
Hello, a few days ago i was playing league with great ping (53 is my average, and it's the lowest it ever gets to, which is fine for me, no delays etc), but since then i've only been able to play league with anywhere between 200-400 ping.

I'd like to know whether this is just me, or if others are experiencing this problem, or even if it's something to do with Riot's servers.


Thankyou.

Here's a Pingtest and a Speedtest taken directly after the ARAMs game i just had, where i was playing with 400 ping. (I apologise if i'm not allowed to post these links etc)

http://www.pingtest.net/result/131355085.png

http://www.speedtest.net/result/4686235178.png
